product.name: Classic White Tablecloth
product.description:
Elegant white tablecloth perfect for any occasion. Made from high-quality cotton for durability and stain resistance. Our classic white tablecloth is designed to complement any table setting and is ideal for both everyday use and special occasions.

Features:
- 100% premium cotton
- Stain-resistant treatment
- Machine washable
- Wrinkle-resistant finish
- Hemmed edges for durability

This timeless tablecloth adds a touch of elegance to your dining experience while being practical and easy to maintain.

product.care_instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors. Gentle cycle with mild detergent. Tumble dry low. Iron on medium heat if needed.
